Battlefield Guide:
This battlefield is inextricable with the Blood Sword Akamanah and the Demonic Sword Zarich.
every week, from Monday to Thursday from 18:00 to 23:59 there is a large-scale battle of the owners of the cursed swords. After the battle ends, at 23:59, the owners of the cursed swords receive a good reward.
In this battle, strategy, the art of battle and strength are intertwined! Ready to try your hand? You will not regret!
